title: The bittersweet moment
author: VD
content_html: We saw a young viszla running through the woods yesterday. It was so familiar, like a fleeting glance through a temporal window back to a time when it was Mithra who was dashing gleefully, back and forth amongst the trees. It was simultaneously heartwarming and sad. Most of all, it was a reminder of how much I miss my dog.
content_text: We saw a young viszla running through the woods yesterday.  It was so familiar, like a fleeting glance through a temporal window back to a time when it was Mithra who was dashing gleefully, back and forth amongst the trees.  It was simultaneously heartwarming and sad.  Most of all, it was a reminder of how much I miss my dog.
